Context:
The text provides information about the benefits of pursuing a career-focused Honours Bachelor degree at George Brown College. Some of the mentioned advantages include smaller class sizes, experienced professors, work-integrated learning opportunities, and networking with potential employers. The college offers bridging programs for students who lack certain U-Level credits or wish to upgrade diplomas or transfer to other colleges or universities. Additionally, applicants can sign up for updates about application deadlines, campus news, events, and tours. The contact information provided is the phone number 416-415-2000, TTY number 1-877-515-5559, and email address ask.george@georgebrown.ca.

Information extracted:
- Smaller class sizes
- Experienced professors
- Work-integrated learning opportunities
- Networking with potential employers
- Bridging programs for missing U-Level credits or upgrading diplomas
- Sign up for application deadlines, campus news, events, and tours updates
- Contact information: 416-415-2000 (phone number), 1-877-515-5559 (TTY number), ask.george@georgbrown.ca (email address).
